channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Just fixed potholes and there again, 2nd April
item.description:
Please can somebody explain to me why you keep sending cowboy tarmac repair people out to fix these potholes. There are now a collection of potholes which are dangerous. They put tarmac into the holes and tamp it. They donâ€™t remove any of the aggregate that had come out previously which is being flicked up and damaging cars. Absolute joke!!!!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 17 Owls End Road, Bishops Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Potholes, 2nd April
item.description:
There are several potholes on the roundabout by the Barnett Way junction, big enough that they must be avoided which is likely to lead to an accident.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 4 Barnett Way, Barnwood
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large & deep pothole on St Pauls Road, near Marle Hill Parade Junction, 1st April
item.description:
The recent rain has enlarged the pothole so that it is very wide & deep. Lots of loose gravel coming out of it as cars go through it & flying gravel debris up at pedestrians walking past.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 37 Saint Paul's Street North, Cheltenham
